Interface RadioService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RadioServiceDAB, RadioServiceFm, RadioServiceIp

    public interface RadioService
    Copyright (C) IRT - Institut f√ºr Rundfunktechnik 2015 Abstract base class for a radio service
    Author:
    Sattler, IRT GmbH, Erk, IRT GmbH

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TermID> getGenres()
      Returns the available TermIDs for this RadioService or an empty list

      Returns the available keywords for this RadioService or an empty list

      Returns the available Links for this RadioService or an empty list

      Returns the available Visuals for this RadioService or an empty list
      java.lang.String getLongDescrition()
      Returns the long description of this RadioService as String
      java.util.List<Group> getMemberships()
      Returns the available Groups for this RadioService or an empty list
      RadioServiceType getRadioServicetype()
      Indicates the type of this RadioService
      java.lang.String getShortDescrition()
      Returns the short description of this RadioService as String
      void subscribe(RadioServiceListener radioServiceListener)
      Subscribe a RadioServiceListener to receive updates from this RadioService
      void unsubscribe(RadioServiceListener radioServiceListener)
      Unsubscribe a RadioServiceListener from this RadioService
